thread.section_title: Point A Hotel, London Canary Wharf - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Unexpected gem
thread.title_full: Unexpected gem - Review of Point A Hotel, London Canary Wharf, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: I8113RUkathyd
title: Unexpected gem
text: We stayed at the Canary Wharf Point A to be close to an event we were visiting and it turned out to be an unexpected gem. Room, although compact, was really well designed with air-con, lighting effects, great tv, really comfy bed and although no wardrobes, hanging space and shelves were perfectly good. Not recommended for a long stay, but perfect for a night or two. Really clean as well and had it's own personality. We loved it!
